definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: In the play, Big Big Wolf is a typical hen-pecked husband.
sentences.chinese: 剧中，“灰太狼”是个典型的“妻管严”。

sentences.english: Shanghai men are quipped as hen-pecked husbands;
sentences.chinese: 上海男人常被戏谑为“妻管严”。

sentences.english: Giving up control is often confused with weakness.
sentences.chinese: 放弃支配对方常常与“妻管严”和“大男人”相混淆。

sentences.english: Shanghai men are jokingly called hen-pecked husbands.
sentences.chinese: 上海男人常被戏谑为“妻管严”。

sentences.english: I didn't know your father is a hen-pecked husband.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道你的爸爸是个妻管严的人。

sentences.english: I don't know my uncle is a hen-pecked husband.
sentences.chinese: 我还不知道我叔叔是个妻管严。

sentences.english: Eg: The henpecked husband carried out everything to his wife's letter.
sentences.chinese: 这个“妻管严”的丈夫对他的妻子言听计从。

sentences.english: He is a typical henpecked husband.
Shanghai men were once mocked as hen-pecked husbands.
sentences.chinese: 上海男人曾被嘲弄为妻管严。

sentences.english: Although Shanghai men are bantered as henpecked husbands, they do not submit to their wives.
sentences.chinese: 虽然上海男人被戏谑为妻管严，但他并不屈从于妻子。

sentences.english: People refer the man who was afraid of his wife as henpecked.
sentences.chinese: 人们把那个怕老婆的男人叫“妻管严”。

sentences.english: And you know how whipped our boss is.
sentences.chinese: 你知道咱们老板是个“妻管严”。

sentences.english: I see. You're afraid of your wife, too!
sentences.chinese: 我明白了，你也是个“妻管严”。

definition: henpecked/to be under one's wife's thumb
(dialect) henpecked/to be under one's wife's thumb
a good wife and loving mother
shrew/see also 河東獅吼|河东狮吼[He2 dong1 shi1 hou3]
(said of sb else's wife) a good wife
Mr Goody-goody/yes-man (sb who agrees with anything)
